mapper.sql: idbmorder, bmcusname, bmordernum, bmbillingdate, bmdeliverydate, bmpaymethod, bmcurrencytype, bmaddcosts, bmorderamount, bmcomments, bmpacreq,bmdenum,bmstatus,bmcreateuserid, bmdelivery_idbmdelivery,tuser_iduser,tcustomer_idcustomer
mapper.insert: insert into bmorder (idbmorder, bmcusname, bmordernum, bmbillingdate, bmdeliverydate, bmpaymethod, bmcurrencytype, bmaddcosts, bmorderamount, bmcomments,bmpacreq,bmdenum,bmstatus, bmdelivery_idbmdelivery,tuser_iduser,tcustomer_idcustomer) values (#{idbmorder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bmcusname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bmordernum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bmbillingdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{bmdeliverydate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{bmpaymethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bmcurrencytype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bmaddcosts,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bmorderamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bmcomments,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bmpacreq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bmdenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bmstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bmcreateuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bmdeliveryIdbmdelivery,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tuserIduser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tcustomerIdcustomer,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into bmorder
idbmorder,
bmcusname,
bmordernum,
bmbillingdate,
bmdeliverydate,
bmpaymethod,
bmcurrencytype,
bmaddcosts,
bmorderamount,
bmcomments,
bmpacreq,
bmdenum,
bmstatus,
bmcreateuserid,
bmdelivery_idbmdelivery,
tuser_iduser,
tcustomer_idcustomer,
#{idbmorder,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{bmcusname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bmordernum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bmbillingdate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{bmdeliverydate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{bmpaymethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bmcurrencytype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{bmaddcosts,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{bmorderamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{bmcomments,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bmpacreq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bmdenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bmstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update bmorder
bmcusname = #{bmcusname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bmordernum = #{bmordernum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bmbillingdate = #{bmbillingdate,jdbcType=DATE},
bmdeliverydate = #{bmdeliverydate,jdbcType=DATE},
bmpaymethod = #{bmpaymethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bmcurrencytype = #{bmcurrencytype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bmaddcosts = #{bmaddcosts,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
bmorderamount = #{bmorderamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
bmcomments = #{bmcomments,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bmpacreq = #{bmpacreq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bmdenum = #{bmdenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bmstatus = #{bmstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bmcreateuserid = #{bmcreateuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bmdelivery_idbmdelivery = #{bmdeliveryIdbmdelivery,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tuser_iduser = #{tuserIduser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tcustomer_idcustomer = #{tcustomerIdcustomer,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where idbmorder = #{idbmorder,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update bmorder set bmcusname = #{bmcusname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bmordernum = #{bmordernum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bmbillingdate = #{bmbillingdate,jdbcType=DATE}, bmdeliverydate = #{bmdeliverydate,jdbcType=DATE}, bmpaymethod = #{bmpaymethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bmcurrencytype = #{bmcurrencytype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bmaddcosts = #{bmaddcosts,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bmorderamount = #{bmorderamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bmcomments = #{bmcomments,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bmpacreq = #{bmpacreq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bmdenum = #{bmdenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bmstatus = #{bmstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bmcreateuserid = #{bmcreateuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bmdelivery_idbmdelivery = #{bmdeliveryIdbmdelivery,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tuser_iduser = #{tuserIduser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tcustomer_idcustomer = #{tcustomerIdcustomer,jdbcType=INTEGER} where idbmorder = #{idbmorder,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select idbmorder,bmcusname,bmordernum,bmbillingdate,bmdeliverydate,bmpaymethod,bmcurrencytype,bmaddcosts ,bmorderamount,bmcomments,bmpacreq,bmdenum,bmstatus,bmcreateuserid,bmdelivery_idbmdelivery,tuser_iduser ,tcustomer_idcustomer,b.uname as ownername, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(bmiproname SEPARATOR ',') FROM bmorderitem where idbmorder=bmorder_idbmorder) as product, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(bmiprotype SEPARATOR ',') FROM bmorderitem where idbmorder=bmorder_idbmorder) as protype from bmorder a left join tuser b on a.tuser_iduser = b.iduser ${filters} order by idbmorder desc

select bm.idbmorder, bm.bmcusname, bm.bmordernum, bm.bmbillingdate, bm.bmdeliverydate, bm.bmpaymethod, bm.bmcurrencytype, bm.bmaddcosts, bm.bmorderamount, bm.bmcomments,bm.bmpacreq,bm.bmdenum, bm.bmstatus,bm.bmcreateuserid, bm.bmdelivery_idbmdelivery,bm.tuser_iduser,bm.tcustomer_idcustomer, bmi.idbmitem, bmi.bmiproname, bmi.bmiprotype, bmi.bmiprice, bmi.bminum, bmi.bmiamount, bmi.bmiistax, bmi.bmioutternum, bmi.bmorderitemcol,bmi.bmipacreq, bmi.bmiunit, bmi.bmorder_idbmorder,t.uname as ownername, (select sum(bmcosts) from bmaddcosts bc where bc.bmorder_idbmorder = bm.idbmorder) as addcosts, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT((bmcosts) SEPARATOR ',') FROM bmaddcosts where idbmorder=bmorder_idbmorder) as addcostsarr, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT((bmcostsdesc) SEPARATOR ',') FROM bmaddcosts where idbmorder=bmorder_idbmorder) as addcostsdescarr from bmorder bm left join bmorderitem bmi on bm.idbmorder = bmi.bmorder_idbmorder left join tuser t on t.iduser = bm.tuser_iduser ${filters} order by bm.idbmorder desc

select bm.idbmorder, bm.bmcusname, bm.bmordernum, bm.bmbillingdate, bm.bmdeliverydate, bm.bmpaymethod, bm.bmcurrencytype, bm.bmaddcosts, bm.bmorderamount, bm.bmcomments,bm.bmpacreq,bm.bmdenum, bm.bmstatus,bm.bmcreateuserid, bm.bmdelivery_idbmdelivery,bm.tuser_iduser,bm.tcustomer_idcustomer, bmi.idbmitem, bmi.bmiproname, bmi.bmiprotype, bmi.bmiprice, bmi.bminum, bmi.bmiamount, bmi.bmiistax, bmi.bmioutternum, bmi.bmorderitemcol,bmi.bmipacreq,bmi.bmiunit, bmi.bmorder_idbmorder,t.uname as ownername,tc.cname,tca.cacontacts,tca.camphone,tca.carecaddress from bmorder bm left join bmorderitem bmi on bm.idbmorder = bmi.bmorder_idbmorder left join tuser t on t.iduser = bm.tuser_iduser left join tcustomer tc on tc.idcustomer = bm.tcustomer_idcustomer left join tcustomerappend tca on tca.idcusapp = tc.tcustomerappend_idcusapp where bm.idbmorder = #{idbmorder,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by bmi.idbmitem asc

select bm.idbmorder, bm.bmcusname, bm.bmordernum, bm.bmbillingdate, bm.bmdeliverydate, bm.bmpaymethod, bm.bmcurrencytype, bm.bmaddcosts, bm.bmorderamount, bm.bmcomments,bm.bmpacreq,bm.bmdenum, bm.bmstatus,bm.bmcreateuserid, bm.bmdelivery_idbmdelivery,bm.tuser_iduser,bm.tcustomer_idcustomer, bmi.idbmitem, bmi.bmiproname, bmi.bmiprotype, bmi.bmiprice, bmi.bminum, bmi.bmiamount, bmi.bmiistax, bmi.bmioutternum, bmi.bmorderitemcol,bmi.bmipacreq,bmi.bmiunit, bmi.bmorder_idbmorder, t.uname as ownername from bmorder bm left join bmorderitem bmi on bm.idbmorder = bmi.bmorder_idbmorder left join tuser t on t.iduser = bm.tuser_iduser where bm.idbmorder = #{idbmorder,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by bm.idbmorder desc
